data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Zone_BurningHands,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Zone_BurningHands)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Zone_BurningHands"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Zone_BurningHands,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Zone_BurningHands,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Zone_BurningHands_4',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Zone_BurningHands_4,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Zone_BurningHands_4)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Zone_BurningHands_4"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Zone_BurningHands_4,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Zone_BurningHands_4,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "RootSpellID" "Shout_Spellbinder_Bind_Projectile_WitchBolt"
data "SpellProperties" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and HasWeaponInMainHand()):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,MainHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Projectile_WitchBolt_4,100,10);IF(HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and not (WieldingWeapon('Melee', true, false, context.Source) or WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', true, false, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,MainHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Projectile_WitchBolt_4,100,10);IF(HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and (WieldingWeapon('Melee', true, false, context.Source) or WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', true, false, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,OffHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Projectile_WitchBolt_4,100,10);"
data "TooltipAttackSave" "RangedSpellAttack"
data "TooltipDamageList" "DealDamage(4d12,Lightning)"
data "TooltipStatusApply" "ApplyStatus(WITCH_BOLT,100,10)"
data "UseCosts" "ActionPoint:1;SpellSlotsGroup:1:1:4"

new entry "STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Projectile_WitchBolt_4"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Projectile_WitchBolt_4',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Projectile_WitchBolt_4,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_WitchBolt_4)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "STATUS_RESOLVED_Projectile_WitchBolt_4"

data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Projectile_WitchBolt_4"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Projectile_WitchBolt_4,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_WitchBolt_4,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "RootSpellID" "Shout_Spellbinder_Bind_Projectile_WitchBolt"
data "SpellProperties" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and HasWeaponInMainHand()):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,MainHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Projectile_WitchBolt_7,100,10);IF(HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and not (WieldingWeapon('Melee', true, false, context.Source) or WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', true, false, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,MainHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Projectile_WitchBolt_7,100,10);IF(HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and (WieldingWeapon('Melee', true, false, context.Source) or WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', true, false, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,OffHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Projectile_WitchBolt_7,100,10);"

data "TooltipStatusApply" "ApplyStatus(WITCH_BOLT,100,10)"

new entry "STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Projectile_WitchBolt_7"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Projectile_WitchBolt_7',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Projectile_WitchBolt_7,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_WitchBolt_7)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Projectile_WitchBolt_7"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Projectile_WitchBolt_7,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_WitchBolt_7,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Command_Grovel,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Command_Grovel,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_Hex_Strength_3,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Strength_3)"

using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Strength_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Strength_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Constitution_3"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Hex_Constitution_3',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_Hex_Constitution_3,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Constitution_3)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Hex_Constitution_3"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Target_Hex_Constitution_3"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Constitution_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Constitution_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

new entry "Passive_Trigger_Target_Hex_Constitution_3"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Passive_Trigger_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "ApplyStatus(STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Hex_Constitution_3,100,0);ApplyStatus(STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0)"

type "SpellData"

data "RootSpellID" "Shout_Spellbinder_Bind_Target_Hex_Constitution"
data "SpellProperties" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and HasWeaponInMainHand()):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,MainHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Target_Hex_Constitution_4,100,10);IF(HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and not (WieldingWeapon('Melee', true, false, context.Source) or WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', true, false, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,MainHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Target_Hex_Constitution_4,100,10);IF(HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and (WieldingWeapon('Melee', true, false, context.Source) or WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', true, false, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,OffHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Target_Hex_Constitution_4,100,10);"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Intelligence_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Intelligence_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Intelligence_6,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Intelligence_6,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

new entry "STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Wisdom_3"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Hex_Wisdom_3',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_Hex_Wisdom_3,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Wisdom_3)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Target_Hex_Wisdom_3"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Wisdom_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Wisdom_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

new entry "Passive_Trigger_Target_Hex_Wisdom_3"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Passive_Trigger_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "ApplyStatus(STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Hex_Wisdom_3,100,0);ApplyStatus(STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0)"

data "TargetRadius" "100"
data "TargetConditions" ""
data "UseCosts" "FauxTagIsBoundSpell:1"

type "StatusData"

new entry "STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Charisma_3"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Charisma_3"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Hex_Charisma_3',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_Hex_Charisma_3,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Charisma_3)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Hex_Charisma_3"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Target_Hex_Charisma_3"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Charisma_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Hex_Charisma_3,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

new entry "Passive_Trigger_Target_Hex_Charisma_3"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Passive_Trigger_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "ApplyStatus(STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Hex_Charisma_3,100,0);ApplyStatus(STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_SPELL_REMOVER,100,0)"

using "Spellbinder_Bound_Armor_BaseInterrupt"
data "Properties" "UseSpell(SWAP,Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_Hex_Charisma_3,true,true,true,,true);ApplyStatus(OBSERVER_OBSERVER,STATUS_SPELLBINDER_BOUND_ARMOR_REMOVER,100,0)"

data "PowerLevel" "4"
data "RootSpellID" "Shout_Spellbinder_Bind_Target_Hex_Charisma"
data "SpellProperties" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and HasWeaponInMainHand()):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,MainHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Target_Hex_Charisma_4,100,10);IF(HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and not (WieldingWeapon('Melee', true, false, context.Source) or WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', true, false, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,MainHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Target_Hex_Charisma_4,100,10);IF(HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_OFFHAND_BINDING') and (WieldingWeapon('Melee', true, false, context.Source) or WieldingWeapon('Ammunition', true, false, context.Source))):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,OffHand,TAGBOUNDSPELL_1_Target_Hex_Charisma_4,100,10);"

data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Zone_GustOfWind_4,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Zone_GustOfWind_4)"

type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Zone_GustOfWind_4,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Zone_GustOfWind_4,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Projectile_AcidArrow,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Projectile_AcidArrow)"

data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Zone_Fear_5,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Zone_Fear_5)"

data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Zone_Fear_5,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Zone_Fear_5,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

new entry "STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Blight_6"
type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_Blight_6',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_Blight_6,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Blight_6)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Target_Blight_6"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_Blight_6,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_Blight_6,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_DominateBeast_6',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_DominateBeast_6,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_DominateBeast_6)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

new entry "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_Target_DominateBeast_6"
type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_DominateBeast_6,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_DominateBeast_6,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"

type "StatusData"
data "StatusType" "BOOST"
data "RemoveEvents" "OnSourceStatusApplied"
data "RemoveConditions" "HasStatus('STATUS_RESOLVED_Target_FleshToStone',context.Source)"
data "OnRemoveFunctors" "IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):UseSpell(Target_Spellbinder_Bound_Target_FleshToStone,true,true,true);IF(RemoveCause(StatusRemoveCause.Condition)):RemoveStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_FleshToStone)"
data "StatusPropertyFlags" "DisableOverhead;DisableCombatlog;DisablePortraitIndicator;IgnoreResting"

type "PassiveData"
using "Spellbinder_Bound_Spell_BasePassive"
data "StatsFunctors" "IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(STATUS_TARGET_TRIGGER_Target_FleshToStone,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,STATUS_CASTER_TRIGGER_Target_FleshToStone,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyEquipmentStatus(SELF,GetAttackWeapon(),SPELLBINDER_WEAPON_REMOVAL_MARKER,100,1);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_SPELL_DANCER_MAGICAL_ARC,100,0);IF(not HasStatus('SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER',context.Source)):ApplyStatus(SELF,SPELLBINDER_LOOP_STOPPER)"
